AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals being smuggled, possibly hidden in a vehicle with fogged windows on a cold night, characterized by unwashed and unkempt appearance, suspected to be in vehicles stopped by Border Patrol agents near the United States-Mexican border, attempting to evade detection, exhibiting efforts to avoid detection by ducking and scrambling, admitted to being undocumented, including three women and five or six men found in a pickup truck camper
